sources.snippet: Breaking language barriers in video calls has become easier than ever, thanks to modern translation technology. Whether you're running international meetings or connecting with friends abroad, there's now a rich selection of tools that can translate conversations in real time.

sources.title: Transync AI â€“ Real-Time AI Translation
sources.snippet: Transync AI voice translator integrates seamlessly with Zoom, Microsoft Teams, Google Meet, and other major platforms. By sharing system audio, it delivers real-time voice translation so every participant can understand instantly.

citation_mappings.claim_text: ğŸ›  Third-Party Windows Apps / Tools These run on Windows and link into meeting audio (system audio or virtual audio driver) for real-time translation: Transync AI â€“ Dedicated Windows app that captures system audio and provides real-time voice translation and subtitles for Zoom, Teams, Google Meet, etc. Supports many languages and voice playback. åŒè¨€ç¿»è¯‘+1

Works as a separate translator overlay rather than native in-call integration. Ztalk.ai â€“ Real-time speech translation tool with a virtual audio driver you select as the mic/speaker device in meetings to translate live between languages. ztalk.ai

sources.title: Meeting Translator - English to Multilingual - Chrome Web Store
sources.snippet: Meeting Translator seamlessly bridges this gap by providing real-time English-to-multilingual translations during your Google Meet and Microsoft Teams calls. As someone who's witnessed the frustration of international colleagues struggling to keep pace with fast-moving discussions, I can attest to how transformative this solution truly is.

If you want true integrated simultaneous interpretation where meeting participants hear translated audio directly, Zoomâ€™s built-in interpretation or Teamsâ€™ upcoming AI interpreter might be closer to that experience, but for Windows applications that translate in real time during Meet/Zoom/Teams calls, Transync AI and tools like Ztalk or Talo are the most practical today.
